TopicTitle: How to get to know something

Articles.Content:
Many of the questions on this forum are already asked before and answered.

So here is my little tutorial if you don't know something

Step 1: go to google

Step 2: enter your question in the search bar

Step 3: press 'Enter'

Step 4: Open all the suggestions on the first page

your answer is in at least one of the suggestions.

Didn't get a answer on your question? Then you can start a new thread in 'Gameplay Questions and Tutorials' with your question.

I hope this helps many of you!

Cheers,

Ferdoni
